inn1.comm: full and up outside off, blocked on the front foot by QDK
goes through QDK this time, it pitched outside off on length and he looked to drive without much footwork but the ball came in to miss the inside edge
closer to middle stump from off, helped to midwicket softly
pitched up slightly on middle again, driven towards midwicket where a dive saves a few runs
looking for a run but not possible, he pushed the full delivery from outside off to cover where Sean Williams jumped to his right and threw the ball quickly to Amla's end
on length outside off, driven to cover again and Williams does well to stop it again
starts on length outside off, left alone by Amla
bring this one in slightly form back on length, Amla defends it towards leg side
fuller and well outside off, just inside the wide line as it's left alone
nips it in from short of length outside off, Amla defends off the back foot towards midwicket
misses this time as it was pitched shorter outside off, Amla flashed and missed
slightly slower and pitched up, it gives Amla enough time to stay back and drive it in the gap between mid-on and midwicket for two to open the account
back of length around middle, QDK waits for it and the ball stops a bit before reaching the batsman who keeps it down with a defence
on the leg side and that's an easy one for him to get off the mark by tucking it a bit wide of midwicket
angles this one into the batsman towards middle and leg, Amla defends it on the leg side
straighter delivery this time on length outside off, Amla leaves
angled into the pads and Amla whips it down to fine leg for one
short ball outside off, QDK looked to pull but the ball held up a bit once again and he defended it with a horizontal bat
width on offer outside off and Amla caresses it past point towards backward deep point for an easy two
brings it in, reducing the width, from short of length and Amla defends it back
much fuller and outside off, Amla leans forward to defend it to cover
short of length ball coming in again, Amla defends off the back foot this time
he offers width this time and Amla cashes in on this one by swinging his arms. He didn't use his feet too much and found the gap between cover and mid-off for the first boundary of the fay
wide outside off again, but Amla misses this time! It was a short delivery, Amla stayed back to cut off the backfoot but didn't judge the pace of the ball properly
back of length around off, QDK stays back and pulls it to midwicket. Wasn't short enough to be pulled away easily in the gap or over the infield
on length and angling away outside off, pushed down towards mid-off
that's beautifully driven down the ground for four! It was slightly full, not much, around middle and QDK simple leaned forward to drive it right down the ground, beating mid-on
cracking shot! He gets width and QDK doesn't leave those. Short and wide and QDK cut it square to the left of point for a four. No time to move for anyone
width there again and slightly full, he looked to drive it down firmly but couldn't middle it properly
towards the pads from leg, tucked to deep backward square leg for an easy one
short of length outside leg, QDK helps it fine down the leg side off his pad for two
angling away from close to off stump, he cuts it late towards point
length delivery close to off stump, he stays back and defends it back
on leg stump and heading towards middle, tucked to midwicket off the back foot. No time for a run there
you can't bowl to him there! Give him width outside off and he'll smack that between cover and cover point for a clean boundary you won't have time to move for
pitched up slightly on middle and leg, QDK drives it down uppishly to mid-on for a quick single
he bowls it short and QDK pulls it with style strsight to deep midwicket
brings it in from back of length just outside off, Amla punches it back
slightly straighter and just outside off, Amla hops back and turns it towards mid-on to change strike
it's shorter and slower which gives QDK enough time to hang back and pull it past short midwicket and wide of deep square leg for another four
short of length on leg stump, helped to short fine leg
fuller on the pads, tucked to deep square leg for one to keep the strike
short again and same result! He can put these away early if you pitch them short around middle and leg, he just goes to the back foot and pulls them away with some power past mid-on for four
better line and length from Madziva, QDK takes a step down and defends it back
on length outside off, he defends it on the off side
short ball - again - and QDK pounces on that one! It pitched outside leg and QDK knew about the big gap on the leg side, found it easily by pulling it to backward square leg for four
outside off now, pushed towards the cover fielder
brings it in a bit from length outside off, Amla leans forward to defend it on off
on length just outside off, drives it down to mid-on with a slightly closed face of the bat
goes all the way! QDK has been eyeing the gap on the leg side and even though this one was pitched well outside off, he put his right foot forward and whipped it to the fine leg boundary for six
wider outside off, and he cuts it to third man for an easy one
short of length from outside off and coming in a bit, defends it late towards third man for another single
short of length on leg, tucked off the pads to deep square leg for a couple
shot of the day! He just stood there and smacked it down the ground, beautiful lofted straight drive over the bowler's head and it smashes into the sight screen after a bounce
length delivery just outside off, Amla drives it down to mid-on
nice slower one to mix up the pace, cutting in from length outside off and Amla blocks off the front foot

that's close for a run out and he's gone up to the third umpre, Amla looks fine though. He helped the short of length ball outside off fine to third man and wanted two. QDK responded for the second and Amla made it well in time to reach safely despite an accurate throw
full and outside off, driven straight to extra cover by Amla
tries to whip the short of length ball from off to leg but gets an inside edge on the thigh pad and gets one on the off side
slower delivery outside off, helped with the angle through covers for one
full and outside off, drives it straight to cover
pitched up again, pushed down to long-off this time
tossed up around off, helped with the turn to midwicket
touch shorter close to off stump, pushed down to long-on for one
on length on the leg stump, tucked to square leg off the pads
full on the stumps, driven down the ground to long-on
there's no slip and that will go for four! The slip was removed only recently and Amla cut this one late from outside off past the slip area fine on the off side for four
short and wide again, Amla can't middle this one though, sends it to cover
bit of extra bounce as Amla leaned forward to the length ball, Jongwe used his fingers to cut the ball in and it bounced off to nearly hit the handle before going to the leg side
short of length delivery around leg and cutting towards off, QDK hops back to defend it
fuller outside leg and he helps it along with a delicate touch down the leg side for two
short ball on leg and this one's pulled to deep backward square leg for two, which brings up QDK's fifty
comes down the ground and drives it to long-on for one
tossed up on middle stump, turned down to long-on for one
flat and short of length around off, Amla pushes it to midwicket
they run a quick one as Amla leans forward and whips this just wide of square leg from length
pitched up outside off, defends it towards cover
flatter one just outside off, Amla cuts it late straight to short-third man
pitched up on the pads, tucked to backward square leg for an easy single
full and flighted around off, drives it down to mid-off
some turn there after it pitched on length outside off and took a thick inside edge to go to the leg side
angled in from round the wicket, Amla comes down and drives it down to long-on
around length and QDK uses his feet two, pushes it down to long-on
length delivery outside off, there's turn and Amla opens the face of the bat to help it to short third man
flatter outside off, cut off the back foot to point
not much gap between cover point and point and this one's cut to cover point
he comes down and Williams bowl it way down leg which means QDK has to adjust and move his feet away to play it to leg
swing and a miss! Tossed up outside off, Amla looks to free his arms but can't connect
touch shorter and still wide, driven down to long-off
slightly full outside off, drives it straight to cover to end the over
turn and bounce! It pitched on length outside off, Amla let it turn and left it seeing it bounce high towards the keeper's shoulders
tries to sweep but is hit on the pad after it pitched outside leg
outside off and this one's driven down to long-off to change the strike
flighted outside off, QDK looked to help it to leg but it didn't turn as much as he expected and took a leading edge to the off side
much shorter and he goes back in the crease to pull it to deep backward square leg for one
tossed up outside off, pushed back easily off the front foot
makes room and cuts it, after waiting for it, to cover point
takes a step down and pushes it down to long-off
much flatter and coming into Amla, he defends it back with a straight bat
flight and wide outside off, he comes down the pitch and turns it to midwicket
flighted well outside off again and this one's pushed down to long-off
on length and coming in towards off, he pushes it back and that's drinks
tossed up outside off, pushed down to long-off
turns it into the batsman and it lobs off the pad as he went to the back foot
much shorter and QDK goes back to pull it for one
comes down the track and drives it down to long-on
sharp turn and bounce from length outside off, he stays back and defends on leg
he knows there's a gap behind square on off now and reverse sweeps it past short third man from outside off for another four - his eighth
and he's welcomed to ODI cricket with a four! He gave a lot of width and flight, Amla came forward and drove it through the covers for a beautiful boundary
flighted again outside off, driven down to long-off now
angles it in from length towards middle stump, QDK cuts it late to point
down the leg side and QDK helps it along the way fine o the leg side for SA's 100
comes down the track and defends the ball on leg stump back to the bowler
flighted outside off and QDK makes room to loft it inside out over cover to find the gap for two
turn surprises Amla a bit after it pitched on off and spun away sharply, Amla got his bat in the way and nearly stopped
comes down to play against the turn and midwicket stops it with a dive
turn again and nearly went to slip! On off, Amla defended it and it lobbed up on the off side
strays down the leg side now for a wide as Amla looks to sweep but it's wide enough to go all the way for a four
tossed up on middle and leg, pushed down to long-on for one
touch short and turning in, he helps it to backward square leg
defends it to backward square leg again trying to push it past him with the turn
outside off, he cuts it late but can't get it past point
turning in from outside off, pushed down to long-on for one

he wants to loft it inside out again but can't, he's given a simple catch to backward point! He made room, seeing the ball with flight outside off and drove in an attempt to put it away with the turn but a leading edge hands an easy peasy catch to Brendan Taylor. that's a big wicket to be Nyumbu's first in ODIs
leans forward and defends this one back
comes down the track and pushes it to cover
comes down again and drives it to long-on to get off the mark
pitched up on off stump, pushed to cover
he's getting those to turn, this one also had sharp turn after pitching on length around middle and spun towards outside off
presses forward to defends this one back to the bowler
strays down the leg side for a wide this time
flight on offer outside off, Faf carefully leans forward to block it
touch shorter on the stumps and Faf goes back to defend it back
comes down the track to defend the straight ball to the leg side with an inside edge
flighted outside off, Amla leans forward and tucks this with the turn to deep fine leg
just outside off and Faf paddles it fine down leg for an easy single
turns it in form length outside off, Faf defends it to midwicket
flighted outside off and it's pushed down again
touch flatter and turning in, Faf goes back to block it this time
comes down the track and gets it past the bowler's dive for one to end the over
comes down to negate the turn but Williams pitches it a touch short and Faf gets a thickish edge to the off side
flighted on off, pushed off the backfoot towards cover
full on middle and leg this time, easily driven down to long-on
flighted and full outside leg, Amla tries to sweep it past short fine leg but Shingi Masakadza dives well to save a few runs
lets it turn after pitching on length outside off, punched towards deep cover for one
slower and touch shorter, cut to deep point after the turn off the back foot and a fumble gives them easy two
turning towards leg from off, Faf tucks it off the backfoot past midwicket for one
it's well outside off as Amla looks to sweep it fine but can't connect and is hit on the pad
paddle sweeps successfully this time as it was closer to the stumps and he gets two to deep fine leg
flighted on length outside off, pushed down to long-off for an easy one
Faf goes back in the crease and turns this one off his pads with the turn to the leg side
flatter outside off, turned off the backfoot past midwicket for one more
flighted on the off stump, driven down to long-on
turning in from outside off, helped with the turn to midwicket
flat and short, turning in again and it's helped straight to midwicket
to midwicket again who dives to his right to save another single
outside off and Faf goes well inside the crease to guide this past midwicket
pushes it down the ground for an easy one from off
turning it in from outside off, tucked to backward square leg for two
paddles it fine down leg and that's Amla's 24th ODI fifty
Faf has something for midwicket - comes down the track and pushes one to him after a bounce
flighted and fuller outside off, driven down to long-off
flighted and full outside off, pushes it back to the bowler
closer to the stumps and Amla paddles it again for more runs there
short and flat, pushed off the back foot on off for one
it's been jabbed to midwicket again, but a abit wide and they scamper for a quick single
this one turns a long way to go down leg from way outside off, Amla leaves but it's not given a wide
further outside off and Amla punches it to cover
cut off the back foot from outside off straight to point
slower through the air outside off, Amla lets it turn and then cuts to point again
cuts it in from short of length outside off, Faf defends it back
on length around off, driven down the ground to long-on
slower one cutting in, but it's full as Amla drives and a thick edge rolls away to third man
quicker one, back of length coming into Faf, who stays back and defends it
from wider outside off, brings it in again and Faf pushes it down to long-on
nipping it in sharply towards off stump and Amla displays a solid defence
flat and turning in from short of length, pushed down to long-on off the back foot
flighted outside off, drives it down again with a slight charge down the ground
he goes back and helps it with the turn to leg side for one
flight around off stump, pushed back to the bowler who dives to stop the ball by barging into the non-striker
flighted and full on off stump, driven down easily to long-on
slower through the air outside off with flight, Faf has to wait for it and it turns to make him defend on the leg side
back of length and angled in, tucked off the back foot to the leg side
short of length from outside off, Faf wants to push it back straight but gets a thick outside edge to the off side
can't middle this one either, he wanted to whip it away to leg but managed an inside edge onto his pads
inside edge onto the pad again as he went back in the crease for the back of length delivery and was crammed for room
full and outside off, cuts it fine on the off side and Madziva dives to his right in the deep to save two runs
well outside off again, helped to third man for an easy single
flighted well outside off, Faf goes back and across, defends it delicately behind square on off for a quick single
flighted and turning in, helped with the turn to the leg side
tossed up just outside off, pushed down to long-on for a single
tucked with the turn from outside off to deep square leg
on length on middle and leg, he goes back and defends towards midwicket
flighted full toss way outside off, driven through the covers for one
slightly slower outside off, Amla looks to turn it to leg, gets an edge behind square on off
Faf comes down and converts it into a full toss which is driven down to long-on
full delivery well outside off, pushed on the off side off the front foot
goes back and across, pushes it down to long-on for one
low full toss on middle and leg, turned to deep backward square leg for one
slower cutter outside off, guides it with delicate hands fine on the off side
on length on off stump, Faf goes back and pushes it down to long-on
fuller and outside leg, flicked off the back foot to leg for one
flatter on middle and leg, Faf pushes it down and Nyumbu dives to his right to save a run
flighted outside off, turned to midwicket with the wrists
on length outside off, cut off the back foot to cover
from wide of the crease round the wicket, it's played off the hips to the leg side for a single
short of length outside off, Faf stays back and whips it to the left of midwicket to long-on

put down but it was a very tough chance! It was full and Amla played inside the line of the delivery, looking to drive it down, but a leading edge flew back to the bowler who went to his right in the air but only got a hand to it, couldn't hold on
another chance! Amla drives it back again as this one was angled in, it was around knee height for Masakadza to catch but it came back too quick for him to grab it with his right hand
comes down the track and pushes it to long-off for one
short of length from outside off, coming in towards middle, Amla hops back and tucks it to deep midwicket for one
turn outside off with width, Amla goes for a big swing but misses
touch shorter outside off, Amla pushes to cover after the turn
comes down the track to block it just after the turn and they sneak in a run despite a direct hit at keeper's end
full and flighted outside off, driven handsomely wide of long-off by Faf
on middle this time on length, Faf blocks it back

what a delivery! Beaten by turn and bounce - it pitched around off and Faf leaned forward to defend but the ball turned, jumped and went just past the outside edge to the keeper and the ball bounced off him too. Time for drinks, by the way
short of length outside off, tucked off the toes to deep midwicket
moves across towards off and flicks this length delivery to the leg side for one
goes way down the leg side for a wide and Mutumbami does well to get his left hand to it
back of length just outside off, turned with the wrists past midwicket off the hips
fuller delivery angled towards middle and leg, driven down easily to long-on
beats the outside edge! It was outside off on length, Amla poked with no footwork and nearly edged it to the keeper
short of length this time and tucked to backward square leg for a single
flighted well outside off, driven to sweeper cover for a single
full and flighted on off, pushed down to cover
falls short! Faf went for a big drive on the up outside off and it fell just short of cover, the fumble also gave them a single
he gets some room after the ball turns and cuts it late between first slip and short third man to find the gap for four
fuller outside off, pushed through the covers into the deep for one
flighted around off stump, he leans forward and blocks
angling it in towards middle and leg, tucked off the pads for one
blocks hole as Faf moves across and blocks it out just in time
slightly high full toss down leg is given a wide
keeps low as Amla went for a big drive outside off for the length delivery but the ball hardly rose and went between bat and pad
short of length this time and headed for the pads, helped to deep backward square leg for one
low full toss on the pads, Faf helps it to shot fine leg, can't get it past him
slow off-cutter from short of length, Faf helps it with the angle to the leg side
he makes room and punches a powerful drive wide of long-off for two
makes room and dispatches this through midwicket! Jongwe pitched it short and slow, Faf waited for it to come to him and slapped it wide of deep midwicket for four runs
edge goes for four now! He charged down the track and went for a big drive and got a thick outside edge flying through the slip are for four. There's no third man

and another one! He's coming down to all of these - charged and lofted the slow and short delivery from outside off over the infield to put it away to deep cover region. And that's Faf's fifty off 69 balls
but he doesn't need to charge! Stays in the crease to make room and gets a full delivery outside off, his eyes light up and he drives it with authority through the covers in the gap
short of length outside off, pushed off the back foot to sweeper cover for one
full delivery goes way down the leg side, it's a wide wide and the keeper can't get their either
on the stumps and Faf blocks it back
takes a step down the pitch and flicks off the pads for one to deep backward square leg
on length towards middle, pushed to midwicket
it's Amla's turn now and what a gorgeous shot that is! He came down and executed a beautiful inside out drive over the covers for a six
goes a bit down the leg side and it's a wide
slightly flatter delivery and Amla comes down to block it back
full and outside off, driven easily with the room on offer to sweeper cover for two
slightly full outside off, Faf comes down and turns it with the wrists past midwicket
he moves across and cuts the wide and short ball off the back foot for one
fullish delivery outside off, Faf lofts it down to long-off after two bounces
that's a lucky four for Amla! It was a slow full toss outside off, Amla was beaten by pace and his drive produced a thick edge past the keeper for four
slow again outside off, driven firmly to cover where a misfield concedes a run
he charges down and is yorked, the ball goes back to the bowler who throws it back to Faf's end trying to run him out
low full toss down leg, helped down leg for a single

that's gone very very high and Faf's gone! Utseya sent in a flatter delivery and Faf went for a big shot on the leg side but mistimed it and the skier was taken well by Sibanda around mid-off as he came running from cover
turning in from outside off, Amla goes back to push it past square leg for two
full and outside off, pushed back to the bowler
outside off again, Amla drives but it goes straight to point
flatter and angled in towards leg, Amla tucks it to the leg side where midwicket does well to save a few runs
drifting in towards leg, driven inside out to long-off
drifting in again, Amla drives it to long-off this time
full on the stumps again, long-off is having a busy over with these drives
length ball around off, pushed back to the bowler
beaten by turn and bounce! It was pitch outside leg and Amla went back, but the turn squared him up with a thick edge
on the leg stump again, tucked to deep midwicket this time
angled in from outside off, pushed down to long-on
flighted outside off, driven to long-off for one
angled in towards middle stump, pushed down to long-on
around off stump, ABD reverse sweeps it to short third man
turning in form outside off, he tucks it to the leg side for two and reaches his 15th ODI hundred
on length and pushed to midwicket's left but he gets there on time
he tries to sweep the ball from middle but misses
it's on off this time, ABD gets a leading edge off reverse sweep and it lands safe behind short third man
pitched up and that's launched like a rocket! It was on leg and ABD middled it to the deep midwicket boundary to spil Williams' economy
short of length outside off and ABD punches it off the back foot, chipping it over cover for two
fuller outside off, pushed down easily for one more
comes down the track but Williams pitches it short, making it difficult for Amla to put it away
out comes the reverse sweep again but ABD gets a leg bye as he can't connect
that's out of the ground! Amla goes down the track and clobbers it to the long-on boundary for a massive six!
and how's that for an orthodox shot! It was pitched up outside off, he went down on a knee and lofted it over sweeper cover for another six
low full toss has gone for a single, ironically, to midwicket
ABD this time! Nyumbu pitched it up and the batsman smashed him straight back to the sight screen for six more

can't get it all the way this time, he's holed out to deep midwicket. It was fullish again and he went for a slog, got bat on it but it wasn't enough to clear the fielder in the deep. but he did his work
short ball from outside off, pulled to deep fine leg for one
slower delivery outside off, driven to the covers for one
short of length outside off, JPD makes room and finds the gap between point and third man for two
angled into JPD and he sends it straight back over the bowler's head for four! There's a gap there, as always, and he absolutely middled that
full delivery down the leg side for a wide
comes down the track and drives the full toss down to long-off
slower delivery on length outside off, Amla throws his bat and it goes in the air wide of cover
loud appeal for lbw as it's angling in, nearly in the block hole, Amla misses but the ball hit his pad outside the off stump
this one's right in the block hole on middle stump, inside edge goes to leg side for one
in the block hole outside off, tapped to point off the back foot
strays down the leg side as Amla looks to paddle it fine, and it's a wide
he makes room and gets it in the zone to dispatch it over the cover fielder and wide of long-off for four with a beautiful drive
full on middle and leg, pushed down the ground for one
moves across to off to paddle it to leg, but the slower ball deceives him and he gets a leg bye
nearly in the block hole, pushed down to long on for one
slow and low full toss, Amla hits it back hard and nearly got Duminy's head on the way
that's lost somewhere in the sky! It was full and slow on the leg stump, JPD wanted to smack it over deep midwicket but hit it too high and deep midwicket could not run in on time to catch it
gets this one away! Full on the pad and he dispatches it to the deep fine leg boundary for four
comes down the track to put it away but it's slow again and he misses
and he finishes it in style! It was pitched up, for a second it looked like it was another sky, which it was, but this one had enough to go all the way. Duminy finishes with a strike rate of 200

inn2.comm: starts off with a yorker, Sibanda stays back and blocks it
angles this one in towards middle and leg, he looks to flick it off the pads but can't connect
swings and misses, it was on length outside off, Sibanda drove but the ball went between bat and pad
misses the outside edge this time! On length and outside off, he drove again and this time it went past the outside edge
towards middle stump, played off the pads towards square leg for two runs. He's off the mark
straighter delivery and it's pushed down to mid-on
short and wide way outside off, he chases but misses and it's called wide
on length and outside off, angling away, left alone this time
angled across again outside off, left alone by Mutumbami
fuller around off stump, pushed back to Parnell by Mutumbami
swings and this one's crashed over pint for four! There was width on offer, he freed his arms and cut it to the left of and over point for a cracking four
punched off the back foot this time - four more! This was well short of length outside off with room and Mutumbami had enough to crash it off the back foot through the covers
width offered again and he goes for another but can't time it well on this occasion
full and outside off, pushed down to mid-on
angling in towards the pads, glanced down to deep fine leg for one
length delivery outside off and holding its line, left alone by Mutumbami
jabs it in from short of length, Mutumbami stays back to defend
swinging away from outside off, he chases and misses with a swing of the bat
angled in towards leg, tapped to midwicket to end the over
quite close to off on length and angling away, Sibanda leaves carefully
charges down and pulls this short ball just past mid-on for four more! Parnell probably saw him come down and pitched it short but Sibanda responded well
pitched up now, Sibanda defends it down to mid-off

caught behind, gets the outside edge! Parnell bowled this teasing line and length outside off with the away angle and Sibanda opened the face of the bat towards square on off which only edged it to QDK who took a low catch

on the leg stump and it's pushed past midwicket and oh there's a mix up but they are safe. Before the ball passed midwicket, Masakadza said wait, so Mutumbami turned back after a couple of steps, but the ball then went past midwicket so Masakadza changed his mind and forced Mutumbami to come for the run
going away outside off, there's extra bounce and it's helped to third man
more bounce! It was on short of length just outside off, Mutumbami stayed back but the ball rose a lot and nearly got his handle
short of length again and another back-foot defence from Mutumbami in the crease
he's banging them short - this one also rose sharply and came in sharply too, the splice of th bat might have been hit there. Luckily for him it didn't go in the air
on length now with some outswing, Mutumbami drives but his bat comes down a bit late
bouncer jabs into the batsman, he ducks under it in time. That's the first of the over
brings it in from short of length, Mutumbami defends it back
slightly full on leg, tapped straight to midwicket

bisects the gap between point and cover point with excellent timing. It as short of length outside off, and Masakadza stayed back to punch it off the back foot before Miller ran all the way and just kept it in to save a run
inside edge goes for four! He played outside off for the angled delivery but it didn't go away that much and the inside edge runs away to fine-leg boundary
solid defence this time off the back foot on the off side for the back of length delivery
back of length on middle, he pulls it to midwicket but it wasn't short enough to be smacked for six
short ball on middle and leg, he stays back and defends it back
brings it in towards off stump from outside, solid defence on the off side
drifts towards the leg side, it's pushed to mid-on
touch shorter outside off, guides it off the back foot to point
short ball outside off, he defends off the back foot
back of length delivery coming in towards middle, no room to put it away anywhere
short ball just outside off, he drops his arms and sways out of the line

loud appeal for caught behind, looked like there was some noise, but they are checking if it carried. It was angled away just like the Sibanda dismissal, Mutumbami went for a drive outside off and looks like the ball dropped just short of de Kock's gloves
bangs in the short ball around off, Mutumbami ducks and sways out of the line
on length right on middle stump, he defends it back. It's a no ball for overstepping
opens up to smack it, it's a short ball and he looks to pull but an inside edge goes back
just past the outside edge, it pitched on middle, he had rolled his fingers over the ball to make it cut away and it nearly got the edge
wider outside off and touch shorter, swing and a miss, and this one falls short of the keeper too
short ball outside off, he hops on his toes to cut it on the off side but can't time it well to middle it
brings it in towards middle and leg from length, helped along to deep fine leg for one
on length on the pad, flicked straight to midwicket
falls short of mid-off! He gave the charge and McLaren banged it in short, the leading edge went towards mid-off in the air off the pull but fell short of Phangiso despite his efforts
on length on the stumps, pushed down to mid-on

caught behind again, this time off a hook. McLaren banged in another short ball which was coming in towards the batsman, who stayed back in the crease and an edge went off the horizontal bat to de Kock for an easy catch
on length and coming in towards off stump, Taylor presents a defence for this
full and drifting in towards leg, pushed back to a diving Phangiso
comes down and drives the full delivery to mid-on for one
flighted and drifting in towards middle stump, presses forward and blocks
comes down and pads the ball that pitched outside leg
Phangiso appeals alone for lbw as the batsman sweeps the ball from middle fine down the leg side past leg slip and he gets a three runs
goes for a slog for this ball that pitched outside leg, but is hit on the pad
comes in sharply from length to hit the pad after an inside edge which stifled the appeal
leans forward and presents a solid defence for the ball outside off
back of length delivery outside off, pushed off the back foot to cover
short ball just outside off, Taylor pulls it uncomfortably to deep square leg for two
short of length and coming in towards middle, tucked to backward square leg for one
coming in from outside off, he looks to cut it to third man but gets a bottom edge towards slip

taken in the deep! Taylor came down and in an attempt to chip it over cover, he gave it too much height and power, which kept the ball in the air for a while and Miller ran in and to his left a long way towards wide long-off for a good catch
pitched up around off, pushed down to long-off
goes back to defend the ball after the turn from outside off
short of length outside off, cut to the off side straight to the fielder
goes back in the crease to defend it back
pushes it towards cover where the fielder does well to stop some runs
short of length outside off, punched off the back foot to sweeper cover
from wide of the crease, full outside off and it's defended back
touch shorter and angled in, tucked towards midwicket, no scope for a run
on length outside off, Williams leans forward and leaves
short of length towards off from outside, tucked behind square on leg side for two
fuller on the off stump, defends it back to the bowler
drifts it in towards leg stump, he blocks it back
on length around off stump, the batsman sweeps it to deep fine leg for one
but there's nobody in the deep for this shot! He comes down the track and smacks it to the long-off boundary for nearly a six. It pitched just inside the boundary rope
short of length from outside off, tapped past midwicket for one
drifts it in towards middle stump, thick outside edge goes on the off side
well outside off but that's swept to deep fine leg for one
length delivery outside off, punched back to the bowler
charges down and swishes at this one to send it straight to cover point
outside off again, whipped away straight to mid-on
full and outside off, driven firmly through the covers for two
back of length delivery outside off, pushed to cover off the back foot
angled in towards middle and leg, tapped to midwicket and that's drinks
on middle and leg, turned away to deep midwicket for one
brings it in towards leg stump, the batsman makes room and pushes it to cover
leans forward and blocks this one to cover
tossed up around middle, thick inside edge goes to midwicket
outside off and turning away, cut off the back foot to sweeper cover
flighted delivery is swept over midwicket's head and wide of long-on for two as Miller runs form long-on to cut it off
tossed up outside off, pushed to cover by the batsman
on middle stump this time, tapped down to long-on for one
around off stump, turned with the spin to the leg side
flighted on middle and off, defends it back to the bowler
edge flies wide of slip! Legspinner tossed up outside off, Masakadza went for a big drive and got a thick edge through what would have been second slip and it goes for four
around off stump, pushed to cover to end the over
tossed up and tapped to backward square leg for one
punched down the ground to long-off for one
tossed up and that's swept away in the air in the gap to the backward square leg boundary for anothe four
swept again in the air but this time Parnell gets there from deep fine leg to cut it off
turning in from outside off, pushed to midwicket where du Plessis dives to save a run
going towards the leg side and it deflects to short fine leg
tossed up around middle, turned a little wide of long-on for one
flighted outside off, swept along the ground to deep square leg
googly comes in from well outside off, Masakadza stayed in and punched it to cover
another googly, and this one hits the pad after an inside edge
low full toss outside off is pushed down to long-on
flatter delivery around off, it's reverse swept to deep third man for two
well outside off, tapped down to third man for one
full and outside off, Williams flashes and it flies to third man where Tahir fumbles while collecting it
short of length and coming in, he defends it on the off side
back of length just outside off, tapped to point off the back foot

falls short of mid-off and goes through for for! He charged down the track and got a bit of width to swing his arms, the mid-off fielder came forward a bit but it came too fast to him, bounced before him and then went through for four
bouncer goes over Masakadza's head to be called wide
trying the blocks hole, it's a very low full toss on off, pushed towards point for one
tossed up outside off, he presses forward to block it back
pitched outside off and turns away to beat Masakadza's sweep
pitched up just outside off, driven down to long-off for one
flatter delivery around off, tapped towards deep fine leg by Williams
around off with a bit of turn, he goes back and pushes it back
he went back again and nearly gave a catch to Tahir while trying to push it down the ground. Gets a run to long-on
well outside off, cut off the back foot to point
short of length outside off, swatted towards mid-on for a quick single
short of length around off, whipped past midwicket in the gap for an easy two
full and wide, driven off the front foot wide of third man for one
gets down on one knee to drive but gets only an edge towards the keeper
on middle and leg in the block hole, pushed down to midwicket
short of length outside off, pulled off the back foot to deep midwicket
full and flighted on leg, driven off the pad to deep midwicket
flighted around off stump, he presses forward and blocks
tossed up again, turned away to the leg side for one
chips it just over midwicket. He went to the back foot to play it after the turn and nearly gave a catch to midwicket, but it went over him to wide long-on
full around leg, driven down firmly to long-on for one more
tossed up and smashed back past the bowler for a four down the ground
full toss and it's gone! That was asking to be hit and Masakadza swung his arms to make it sail over long-on for six
on length outside off, pushed to the off side after some turn
low full toss on leg, turned away to deep midwicket for one
falls well short. It was pitched up and Williams lofted it with the turn on the leg side but it fell very short of long-on who was running in
tossed up around off, pushed off the front foot towards point
short of length on middle, turned away off the back foot to deep square leg for one
around middle and leg, flicked to deep square leg for another
flighted outside leg, swept to Amla for an easy single
on length around off, he defends it back
there's a gap there and he finds it with a well-executed reverse sweep! It pitched just outside off and he put it in the gap past short third man to bring up his fifty
low full toss outside off, driven down to long-on
on length on off, tapped to point with a small stride forward
short of length and wide, punched off the back foot to sweeper cover
back of length outside off, thick edge flies off to third man
quick bouncer just outside leg stump and Masakadza withdrew just in time to get off balance a little bit
short of length on middle, turned down towards mid-on
tries to tap it down to third man outside off, but misses
comes down the pitch and drives easily to long-on
he also comes down and Duminy pitches it short, but Masakadza taps it past midwicket for one
tossed up outside off and Wiliams smacks it over the wide long-on boundary with his trademark sweep for a six
flatter and outside off, cut straight to point
punches it off the back foot from outside off to wide long-off for two more
flighted outside off, pushed to cover to end the over
touch short of length on leg, turned straight to midwicket
it's well outside off but Masakadza puts it away to the fine leg boundary for four. There's nobody in the deep and Masakadza paddles it over short fine leg
pulled with such authority, has that gone all the away? It was short and there's no long on, Masakadza smoked it right there and the ball bounced a couple of millimeters before the rope
goes down the leg side for a wide now
outside off, tapped down to third man easily for one
into the pads and run down to fine leg for one. This partnership is now worth 100 from 102 balls

oh he's gone just when people had started talking about the threatening stand! Parnell pitched it short and way outside off, and Masakadza cut it straight under du Plessis' throat for a catch. He didn't have to move an inch
length delivery on off, dabbed to point after it kept low
touch short around off, run down to deep fine leg for one
welcomes him with a bouncer just outside off, nearly took Elton's gloves on the way to the keeper
full and outside off, pushed to cover
keeps a bit low and goes under the bat as Elton looked to cut it from outside off
short one to end the over, this time Elton drops his hands to leave it
short of length around off, pulled off the back foot to deep midwicket
tossed up outside off, tapped towards point for one
flighted outside off, he looks to push but misses
googly comes in from outside off, tapped towards point for one and he's off the mark
it's short and there's room, Williams swat this ball down the ground, beating mid-off for a boundary to bring up his fifty
he will be so disappointed with that! It was short and wide, he cut it as his eyes must have lit up but it went in the air and it was taken easily by du Plessis at point
slightly short and outside off, he chases and misses this one
angles it in towards off stump, blocked back by the batsman
quick bouncer comes into the batsman, he leaves and it's called a wide
brings it in sharply towards off stump, defends it back to the bowler again
short ball and it's put away between midwicket and mid-on for four. It didn't bounce that much but Elton did well to find the gap and give himself some confidence
outside off this time on eleventh, left alone by Chigumbura
in the block hole, digs it out and its gone straight down the ground for one
too full around off, blocked back towards the bowler
tossed up outside off, pushed down to cover
flighted again, he finds the gap this time between cover and cover point
full around off, blocked back to the bowler
flighted googly outside off, he looks to cut but is beaten by the turn and bounce
flighted around off, leans forward to block this one
flat delivery outside off, tapped down to long-off for one
comes down the track and a thick inside edge runs down to short fine leg
tossed up around middle, pushed to midwicket
touch shorter around off, punched off the back foot past the bowler
flighted on leg and it's swept past short fine leg for one
short of length on leg, goes down to short fine leg off the pad
googly tossed up well outside off, the turn and low bounce beats him
tossed up around off, driven softly to cover
low full toss outside off, pushed down to long-off
full on leg stump, flicked to the leg side straight to the fielder
touch shorter around middle stump, pushed down to long-on
towards leg stump, tapped to backward square leg
short of length on middle, tapped down towards long-on but it's too slow and midwicket gets there on time to cut it off
going down the leg side and he runs it fine to beat deep fine leg for his first boundary
tossed up around leg, tapped to midwicket
flighted around middle and leg, defends to midwicket again
stays back and defends to cover this time from off
full and flighted on middle, pushed down to long-on for one
short just outside off, pulled to deep backward square leg for one
in the block hole on off, blocked back by Chigumbura
back of length outside off, swatted down to long-on for a single
slow bouncer cuts in from outside off, the batsman sways out of the line and drops his arms just in time
full and just outside off, pushed back to the bowler
low full toss outside off, driven past cover in the gap
jumps down the the track and hammers it to mid-on. They try for a quick single, but they have second thoughts. The throw hits direct, but it seems he has just about made his ground
tossed up in leg stump, Jongwe keeps his front leg out of the way as he defends
that's better, lifts it over the midwicket region extremely competently. Lovely shot, flowed into it
tries to cramp him up on leg stump, Jongwe tucks it through midwicket, along the ground this time
nicely tossed up on middle, but the batsman prefers to stay back and block
a little shortish and he backs away to punch into the off side
short and wide from McLaren, he flays the ball over the cordon. Doesn't hold back one bit and it flies down on the bounce to third man
a little closer on off stump so the cut is not the best option there. He realises it quite late and tries to adjust, but is still beaten
goes for a fuller length, turns out as a full toss, drilled into the covers
angled in towards off stump, he covers the stumps on the back foot and chops it down to third man
banged in short and the direction is good too, right over middle. Jongwe was set to take it on, but pulls out of it
yorker outside off, steered to point
tossed up on off, he comes down the track and turns it towards midwicket
flighted on off, pushed down towards long-off but Phangiso dives full length to stop it
flatter delivery around off, he goes back and pushes it to cover
short of length on leg and he crouches a bit to swat it to deep square leg for a four
pushed down the ground from length to long-off for one
cut off the back foot straight to point
short of length around off, tapped to midwicket by Chigumbura
nearly in the block hole on off and middle, driven past midwicket for a single
short of length towards middle and leg, helped past short fine leg
full on off, pushed down to mid-on for a quick single
full slower delivery outside off, punched down to mid-off
full toss on middle and leg, chipped away over and wide of mid-on right in the gap for four
Tahir is back and how! It was a straight delivery that pitched on off and middle, and was going straight as Jongwe tried to sweep and was hit right in front on the pad
welcomes the new man with a googly from outside off and he manages to defend it
quicker delivery on off stump, he defends it back
dropped! Low full toss on off is chipped back to the bowler and Tahir puts it down. Wasn't an easy catch
flatter delivery on off stump, tapped to backward point
on length outside off, he chases with a drive and misses
going down leg this time and it's deflected off Chigumbura's body on the leg side
short ball outside off, slapped through the cover wide of mid-off and Amla dives to his left to save some runs
short and wide, helped with the bounce towards third man
back of length around off, pulled to deep midwicket for one
full on off, he charges down the track and gets this one to leg side

that's a very well judged catch at long-on! Tahir tossed it up outside off and Madziva sent it high in the sky, trying a six, but didn't get all the distance and Duminy stood just centimeters inside the long-on rope to pouch this over his head
tossed up around off, can't connect the sweep
flighted outside off, driven to deep cover for one
googly comes in a bit from outside off as Masakadza misses the slog sweep
flatter delivery going down leg, hit on the pads in an attempt to glance it
outside off again, he chips it over cover for one
moves it away after pitching it outside off, swing and a miss
that's too short and pulled away with style to the midwicket boundary for four
short ball on leg, hooked to deep backward square leg for one
full delivery outside off, punched down to mid-off
short of length towards of stump, helped to point off the back foot
short delivery from outside leg, pulled to backward square leg for one more
short of length outside off, pushed to cover with the turn
on length outside off, lets it turn and it's pushed off the back foot
he stays back again and tries to poke at the turning ball but is beaten
another one trapped! Phangiso pitched it up a little this time on off stump and Masakadza looked to sweep but missed it completely and was caught right in front. Easy decision for the umpire
pitched up around leg, defends it on leg side
looks to cut off the back foot and gets a bottom edge past point to get off the mark
short of length well outside leg and it's been run down to the fine leg boundary off the pads for four
fuller outside off, he presses forward and blocks it
on length and angling away, pushed down towards mid-off off the front foot
slow and short well outside off, he looked to run it down to third man but missed it
bangs it in from outside leg, tapped towards backward square leg off the back foot
another short ball outside off, slower on pace, goes past the outside edge
tossed up on off, pushed to cover off the front foot
flighted half volley on leg, driven to deep midwicket to rotate strike
short of length around off, he goes back and punches it down to long-off
tossed up on off, driven down to long-off again
fullish around off, pushed straight to cover
comes down the track and drives it down to long-on for one
flighted half volley outside off, pushed with the turn to deep cover
full toss on leg, turned away to the leg side
brings in a googly from outside off, he goes back to defend this one
tossed up outside off, chipped in the air between the bowler and cover for one
quicker one on the leg stump, he runs it down to fine leg and du Plessis does well to cut it short
googly comes in from outside off, he presses forward to block it
sort of length on elg stump, tapped to deep midwicket for one
goes back to cut the short ball on the off side but he makes a mess of it, misses it completely and his off stump is knocked over. Duminy gets his first wicket of the match
defends the length ball on leg on the leg side
sweeps the length ball from outside off to short fine leg
stifled appeal for lbw as the ball pitched on middle-leg and is turning toward leg, but it was close since it hit him on the back foot
quicker one on off, inside edge goes to short fine leg
on length on off stump, pushed down to long-on for one
tries to sweep the length ball against the turn but misses
tries another slog sweep and a leading edge falls out of midwicket's reach for a single
on length outside off, thick edge goes towards point
it's all over on the penultimate ball! Chigumbura, after a patient innings, lofts it as if he is giving catch practice after it pitched on length on the stumps for an easy catch to mid-on
